PM.recommendation_text: Avoid codeine in CYP2D6 poor metabolizers. Consider morphine or non-opioid alternatives.

IM.recommendation_text: Reduced conversion to morphine. Monitor efficacy. Consider alternative analgesic if inadequate response.

RM.recommendation_text: Increased morphine formation possible. Monitor for toxicity.

URM.recommendation_text: Avoid codeine due to risk of morphine toxicity.

PM.recommendation_text: Reduced metabolism of warfarin. Initiate lower dose and monitor INR closely.

IM.recommendation_text: Consider lower initial dose. Monitor INR carefully.

NM.recommendation_text: Standard dosing with routine INR monitoring.

PM.recommendation_text: Avoid clopidogrel in CYP2C19 poor metabolizers. Consider prasugrel or ticagrelor.

IM.recommendation_text: Reduced activation of clopidogrel. Consider alternative antiplatelet therapy.

PM.recommendation_text: High risk of simvastatin-induced myopathy. Consider lower dose or alternative statin.

IM.recommendation_text: Increased risk of myopathy. Use lower dose and monitor.

PM.recommendation_text: Avoid azathioprine due to risk of severe myelosuppression.

IM.recommendation_text: Start with reduced dose and monitor blood counts closely.

PM.recommendation_text: Avoid fluorouracil due to high risk of severe toxicity.

IM.recommendation_text: Reduce starting dose and monitor closely for toxicity.
